Asteroid designations ( Number, Name, Temporary designation): 20826, -, 2000_UV13
Observation was done on (UT) (format YYYY-MM-DD-hh): 2005 - 06 - 20 - 00:00
Observation was made by : Simone Ieva E-mail; simone.ieva@obspm.fr
At observatory with UAI code: 262
Obsv. comments: Ieva et al. (2013) in preparation
The spectrum was published in the article: http://www.oa-roma.inaf.it/planet/NEOSURFACE.html
The normalization of this spectrum was made for the wavelength: 0.550 microns.
Original name of the file was: UV13.txt
